垚字的基本解释

垚
yáo
古同“尧”。

垚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》五聊切，平蕭，疑。］
“垚1”的今字。“尧1”的繁体字。
(1)高。
(2)传说中古帝陶唐氏之号。
(3)借指贤明、能干的君主或圣人。
(4)姓。北魏有尧暄。见《魏书》本传。

垚字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垚； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页228第07
【廣韻】五聊切【集韻】【韻會】倪幺切，?同堯。从三土積纍而上。象高形。

垚字的源字形

字源演变：

垚字的起名意思

：同“尧”，指山高的样。

Yao
Basic explanation of words
Yao
yáo
Ancient Tong "Yao".
Yao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" five chats and cuts, Pingxiao, suspicious. ]
The current word for "Yao 1". Traditional characters of "尧1".
(1) High.
(2) The legendary name of the ancient Emperor Tao Tang.
(3) By referring to a wise and capable monarch or saint.
(4) Last name. There was Yaoxuan in the Northern Wei Dynasty. See the biography of "Wei Shu".
Yao

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垚; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 228 No. 07
[Guang Yun] Five Chats and Cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ni Yaoqie,? Tong Yao. Accumulate from the three soils. Like a tall shape.
